name: The Demon Summoning - UPDATED
description:
This is a short (10 minute) narrative horror style game about a demon, at its current state of development, as long as you can avoid being caught you'll finish the game.

Controls: WASD for Movement, Shift for sprint, Space to jump, Q for torch (battery remaining on right hand side of screen), Left click to open closets to hide in, or to pick up batteries scattered about the house. Escape to pause the game.

Please let me know of any bugs you find, or any suggestions to improve the game, I am working on adding subtitles to the audio for the next version.

UPDATED: Version 1.1 has been released - Bug fixes for the UI, collision detection fixed upstairs, heartbeat audio added to aid the player in knowing how close the demon is. New cover art for the page.
